mapper.select: select cust_nm ,cust_sn ,cust_pridtf_no ,cust_mbl_telno ,(select emp_nm from kcgbd.e_employee where emp_no = a.emp_no) from kcgbd.e_customer a

select cust_nm ,cust_sn ,cust_mbl_telno ,cust_pridtf_no ,cust_eml_addr ,cust_home_telno ,(select comm_nm from kcgbd.e_common where comm_no = a.cust_cr_no) cust_cr_no ,cust_road_nm_addr ,a.emp_no ,(select emp_nm from kcgbd.e_employee where emp_no = a.emp_no) ,(select comm_nm from kcgbd.e_common where comm_no = b.emp_dept) emp_dept ,(select comm_nm from kcgbd.e_common where comm_no = b.emp_posit) emp_posit ,(select emp_mbl_telno from kcgbd.e_employee where emp_no = a.emp_no) from kcgbd.e_customer a left join kcgbd.e_employee b on a.emp_no = b.emp_no where a.cust_sn = cast(#{cust_sn} as numeric(5))

/* system.team2.promion_mng.getprodinfo */ select prod_no , prod_nm , prod_type , sub_tg , price_min , price_max , pay_cycle , air_min , air_max , pay_period , interest_ta , sale_beg_dt , sale_end_dt , 0 as circle_acml_amt , 0 as goal_amt , 0 as goal_prd , 0 as tot_dpst_amt , 0 as tot_dpst_int , 0 as int_tax_amt , 0 as bfo_rcve_amt , 0 as atx_rcve_amt from kcgbd.e_product_save a where prod_no = cast(#{prod_no} as bigint)

/* system.team2.promion_mng.getProdDp */ select prod_no , prod_nm , prod_type , sub_tg , price_min , price_max , pay_cycle , air_min , air_max , pay_period , interest_ta , sale_beg_dt , sale_end_dt , 0 as circle_acml_amt , 0 as goal_amt , 0 as goal_prd , 0 as tot_dpst_amt , 0 as tot_dpst_int , 0 as int_tax_amt , 0 as bfo_rcve_amt , 0 as atx_rcve_amt from kcgbd.e_product_dp a where prod_no = cast(#{prod_no} as bigint)

/* system.team2.promion_mng.getProdLoan */ select prod_no , prod_nm , prod_type , sub_tg , price_min , price_max , pay_cycle , air_min , air_max , pay_period , interest_ta , sale_beg_dt , sale_end_dt , 0 as goal_prd , 0 as circle_pay_amt , 0 as circle_repy_amt , 0 as circle_int , 0 as tot_int_amt , 0 as tot_pay_amt , 0 as circle_acml_amt_fmt , 0 as circle_acml_amt , 0 as tot_dpst_amt_fmt , 0 as tot_dpst_int_fmt , 0 as int_tax_amt_fmt , 0 as bfo_rcve_amt_fmt , 0 as atx_rcve_amt_fmt , 0 as loan_amt_fmt , 0 as circle_pay_amt_fmt , 0 as circle_repy_amt_fmt , 0 as circle_int_fmt , 0 as tot_int_amt_fmt , 0 as tot_pay_amt_fmt from kcgbd.e_product_loan a where prod_no = cast(#{prod_no} as bigint)

/* system.team2.promion_mng.getProdAc */ select prod_no , prod_nm , prod_type , sub_tg , price_min , price_max , pay_cycle , air_min , air_max , pay_period , interest_ta , sale_beg_dt , sale_end_dt , 0 as circle_acml_amt , 0 as goal_amt , 0 as goal_prd , 0 as tot_dpst_amt , 0 as tot_dpst_int , 0 as int_tax_amt , 0 as bfo_rcve_amt , 0 as atx_rcve_amt from kcgbd.e_product_ac a where prod_no = cast(#{prod_no} as bigint)

/* system.team2.promion_mng.getDsgnSavgpl */ select a.plan_no , a.prod_no , b.prod_nm , b.pay_cycle , to_char(wrt_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd') wrt_dt , a.circle_acml_amt , a.goal_prd , a.aply_rate , a.interest_ta , a.tot_dpst_amt , a.tot_dpst_int , a.int_tax_amt , a.atx_rcve_amt , a.prod_type , a.cust_sn , b.sub_tg , b.price_min , b.price_max , b.air_min , b.air_max , b.pay_period , b.sale_beg_dt , b.sale_end_dt from kcgbd.e_planlist a full outer join kcgbd.e_product_save b on a.prod_no = b.prod_no where a.plan_no = cast(#{plan_no} as numeric(5))

/* system.team2.promion_mng.getDsgnAcmlpl */ select a.plan_no , a.ac_prod_no prod_no , b.prod_nm prod_nm , b.pay_cycle , to_char(wrt_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd') wrt_dt , a.goal_amt , a.goal_prd , a.aply_rate , a.interest_ta , a.tot_dpst_amt , a.tot_dpst_int , a.int_tax_amt , a.atx_rcve_amt , a.prod_type , a.cust_sn , b.sub_tg , b.price_min , b.price_max , b.air_min , b.air_max , b.pay_period , b.sale_beg_dt , b.sale_end_dt from kcgbd.e_planlist a full outer join kcgbd.e_product_ac b on a.ac_prod_no = b.prod_no where a.plan_no = cast(#{plan_no} as numeric(5))

/* system.team2.promion_mng.getDsgnDpstpl */ select a.plan_no , a.dp_prod_no prod_no , b.prod_nm prod_nm , b.pay_cycle , to_char(wrt_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd') wrt_dt , a.circle_acml_amt , a.goal_prd , a.aply_rate , a.interest_ta , a.tot_dpst_amt , a.tot_dpst_int , a.int_tax_amt , a.atx_rcve_amt , a.prod_type , a.cust_sn , b.sub_tg , b.price_min , b.price_max , b.air_min , b.air_max , b.pay_period , b.sale_beg_dt , b.sale_end_dt from kcgbd.e_planlist a full outer join kcgbd.e_product_dp b on a.dp_prod_no = b.prod_no where a.plan_no = cast(#{plan_no} as numeric(5))

/* system.team2.promion_mng.getDsgnLoanpl */ select a.plan_no , a.loan_prod_no prod_no , b.prod_nm prod_nm , b.pay_cycle , to_char(wrt_dt,'yyyy-mm-dd') wrt_dt , a.circle_acml_amt , a.goal_prd , a.aply_rate , a.interest_ta , a.tot_dpst_amt , a.tot_dpst_int , a.int_tax_amt , a.atx_rcve_amt , a.prod_type , a.cust_sn , b.sub_tg , b.price_min , b.price_max , b.air_min , b.air_max , b.pay_period , b.sale_beg_dt , b.sale_end_dt , a.loan_rpty_cd , circle_pay_amt , circle_repy_amt , circle_int , tot_int_amt , tot_pay_amt from kcgbd.e_planlist a full outer join kcgbd.e_product_loan b on a.loan_prod_no = b.prod_no where a.plan_no = cast(#{plan_no} as numeric(5))
mapper.insert: /* system.team2.promion_mng.insertDsgnSavgpl */ insert into kcgbd.e_planlist ( circle_acml_amt , goal_prd , aply_rate , interest_ta , wrt_dt , tot_dpst_amt , tot_dpst_int , int_tax_amt , atx_rcve_amt , cust_sn , prod_no , prod_type ) values ( #{circle_acml_amt} , #{goal_prd} , cast(#{aply_rate} as numeric(5,2)) , #{interest_ta} , now() , cast(#{tot_dpst_amt} as numeric(8)) , cast(#{tot_dpst_int} as numeric(8)) , cast(#{int_tax_amt} as numeric(8)) , cast(#{atx_rcve_amt} as numeric(8)) , cast(#{cust_sn} as numeric(5)) , #{prod_no} , #{prod_type} )

/* system.team2.promion_mng.insertSavgplSell */ insert into kcgbd.e_product_init ( sa_prod_no , cust_sn , sub_ymd , end_ymd , price , interest_rate , interest_ta ,emp_no ,prod_type ) values ( cast(#{prod_no} as numeric(5)), cast(#{cust_sn} as numeric(5)), current_date, current_date + INTERVAL '1 month' * cast(#{pay_period} as integer), cast(#{tot_dpst_amt} as bigint), cast(#{aply_rate} as numeric(3,1)), #{interest_ta}, #{emp_no}, #{prod_type} )

/* system.team2.promion_mng.insertDpstplSell */ insert into kcgbd.e_product_init ( dp_prod_no , cust_sn , sub_ymd , end_ymd , price , interest_rate , interest_ta ,emp_no ) values ( cast(#{prod_no} as numeric(5)), cast(#{cust_sn} as numeric(5)), current_date, current_date + INTERVAL '1 month' * cast(#{pay_period} as integer), cast(#{tot_dpst_amt} as bigint), cast(#{aply_rate} as numeric(3,1)), #{interest_ta}, #{emp_no} )

/* system.team2.promion_mng.insertLoanplSell */ insert into kcgbd.e_product_init ( loan_prod_no , cust_sn , sub_ymd , end_ymd , price , interest_rate , interest_ta ,emp_no ) values ( cast(#{prod_no} as numeric(5)), cast(#{cust_sn} as numeric(5)), current_date, current_date + INTERVAL '1 month' * cast(#{pay_period} as integer), cast(#{tot_dpst_amt} as bigint), cast(#{aply_rate} as numeric(3,1)), #{interest_ta}, #{emp_no} )

/* system.team2.promion_mng.insertAcmlplSell */ insert into kcgbd.e_product_init ( ac_prod_no , cust_sn , sub_ymd , end_ymd , price , interest_rate , interest_ta ,emp_no ) values ( cast(#{prod_no} as numeric(5)), cast(#{cust_sn} as numeric(5)), current_date, current_date + INTERVAL '1 month' * cast(#{pay_period} as integer), cast(#{tot_dpst_amt} as bigint), cast(#{aply_rate} as numeric(3,1)), #{interest_ta}, #{emp_no} )
mapper.update: /* system.team2.promion_mng.updateInitYN */ update kcgbd.e_planlist set init_yn = 'Y' where plan_no = cast(#{plan_no} as numeric(5))
/* system.team2.promion_mng.updateDpInitYN */ update kcgbd.e_planlist set init_yn = 'Y' where plan_no = cast(#{plan_no} as numeric(5))
/* system.team2.promion_mng.updateLoanInitYN */ update kcgbd.e_planlist set init_yn = 'Y' where plan_no = cast(#{plan_no} as numeric(5))
/* system.team2.promion_mng.updateAcInitYN */ update kcgbd.e_planlist set init_yn = 'Y' where plan_no = cast(#{plan_no} as numeric(5))
